alert.note: Alert for Franklin; Madison (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued July 20 at 8:35PM EDT until July 20 at 11:00PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 915 PM EDT FOR NORTHERN FRANKLIN...NORTHEASTERN MADISON AND SOUTHERN UNION COUNTIES IN CENTRAL OHIO... At 835 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Plain City, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor hail damage to vehicles is possible. Expect wind damage to trees and power lines. Locations impacted include... Columbus, Dublin, Westerville, Upper Arlington, Gahanna, Hilliard, Marysville, Worthington, Bexley, Plain City, West Jefferson, Minerva Park, New California, Ohio State University, Easton, Lake Darby, Whitehall, New Albany, Grandview Heights and Obetz. This includes the following Interstates... I-70 in Ohio between mile markers 85 and 107. I-71 in Ohio between mile markers 103 and 120. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. To report severe weather, go to our website at weather.gov/iln and submit your report via social media, when you can do so safely.
